head.title: Waunakee Community School District | Committed to Children

meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to the Waunakee Community School District where links to our administrative offices, the Arboretum Elementary, Heritage Elementary, Prairie Elementary, Intermediate School, Middle School and High Schools are listed.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Waunakee Community School District, WCSD, Waunakee Schools, Waunakee School District

div.a: Learning @ Home website with information for WCSD reponse to the COVID 19 school closures. >

div.p: We strive to be on the leading edge academically and seek opportunities to improve our programs each year. Read more about how our students are growing and achieving more academically.
